properties.query:
dsp_parser
| where EventID == 9212
| where SecurityIndicatorName == "Well-known privileged SIDs in sIDHistory"
properties.description: 'This indicator looks for security principals that contain specific SIDs of accounts from built-in privileged groups within their sIDHistory attribute. This would allow those security principals to have the same privileges as those privileged accounts, but in a way that is not obvious to monitor (e.g. through group membership).'
properties.name: Semperis DSP Well-known privileged SIDs in sIDHistory
